summary: American entrepreneurs in Nicaragua encounter local resistance.
cast: Chris Berry|Daniel Campesino|Jimmy Carter|Fred Goldfarb|Keith Griffith|Eduardo Holman|Sean Jackson|Zacarias Lopez|Sebastien Ramos Narvaez|Daniel Ortega|Lester Ortiz Pasos|Eden Pastora|Maria Peralta|Ivan Salazar|Dean Sardino
title: Land
